description: A React component for a transcript review page, allowing users to load, edit, save transcripts, and extract quotes. It manages state, fetches data from API endpoints, and renders UI elements including a transcript editor and status badges.

methods.name: onSave
methods.description: Saves the current transcript to the backend and updates the state.

methods.name: onExtractQuotes
methods.description: Triggers quote extraction process for the current transcript.
